formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu dieser Applikation in Asterisk 1.4:

para.screen:
-= Info about application 'Dictate' =-
[Synopsis] Virtual Dictation Machine
[Description] Dictate([<base_dir>[|<filename>]]) Start dictation machine using optional base dir for files.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.2 zu 1.4:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.2 +++ in Asterisk 1.4 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Virtual Dictation Machine
[Description] - Dictate([<base_dir>]) + Dictate([<base_dir>[|<filename>]]) Start dictation machine using optional base dir for files.

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:

para.screen:
--- in Asterisk 1.4 +++ in Asterisk 1.6 @@ -4,5 +4,5 @@ Virtual Dictation Machine
[Description] - Dictate([<base_dir>[|<filename>]]) + Dictate([<base_dir>[,<filename>]]) Start dictation machine using optional base dir for files.
